text:
Blue Apron - New York City (SOHO)

Food/recipe subscription service: we send weekly boxes packed with fresh ingredients and awesome recipes.

We're a Ruby on Rails shop for the most part, with frontend bits written in Backbone and a Warehouse Management System written in Ember!

Roles:

Frontend developer: https://www.blueapron.com/pages/jobs?gh_jid=14848

Software engineer: https://www.blueapron.com/pages/jobs?gh_jid=11091
